content.raw:
While I added the `NONE` integer mode, I didn't add  a matching `None` string mode, because the string control mechanism is long-deprecated and shouldn't be used.

If somebody requests `None` via the deprecated mechanism, they'll get a [warning](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/c3ce7119a8aa2488f9d8b7a0c9bb4b2841a71e7d/drcsim_gazebo_ros_plugins/src/AtlasPlugin.cpp#cl-1785), which I think is the correct result.
content.html:
While I added the NONE integer mode, I didn't add a matching None string mode, because the string control mechanism is long-deprecated and shouldn't be used.

If somebody requests None via the deprecated mechanism, they'll get a warning, which I think is the correct result.
